Class GameLoopManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.core.GameLoopManager
public class GameLoopManager extends Object
Manages the main game loop, timing, and mode changes, coordinating periodic drop events and UI interactions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Eashwar

  • Constructor Details

    • GameLoopManager

      public GameLoopManager(GuiController guiController)
      Constructs the loop manager connected to the GUI controller.
      Parameters:
      guiController - the GUI controller for dispatching events

  • Method Details

    • setupModeHandler

      public void setupModeHandler(javafx.scene.control.Label timerLabel, OverlayManager overlayManager)
      Configures the game mode handler, wiring timer and overlay callbacks and sending the mode changes to the renderer and controller.
      Parameters:
      timerLabel - label to display timer or mode information
      overlayManager - manager handling overlays such as game over

    • setupTimeline

      public void setupTimeline()
      Initializes the timeline that triggers periodic down events based on the current fall interval.

    • isPlaying

      public boolean isPlaying()
      Indicates whether the game is currently running (not paused or over).
      Returns:
      true if active, false if paused or game over

    • getModeHandler

      public GameModeHandler getModeHandler()

    • getTimeLine

      public javafx.animation.Timeline getTimeLine()

    • getIsPause

      public javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty getIsPause()

    • getIsGameOver

      public javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty getIsGameOver()

    • updateFallInterval

      public void updateFallInterval(int level)
      Updates the fall interval according to the level and restarts the timeline when appropriate.
      Parameters:
      level - current game level
